Articles.Content:
KAR or Kerbin Air Force are now needing a new fighter/bomber. They need you to build them one. (All the engineers blew up in a rocker ). The requirements for this aircraft are:

1. No mods except mech jeb and bd armories.

2. Aircraft must have guns, carries 4 air to ground missiles, 4 air to air missiles, and some bombs.

3. Aircraft must be highly manuverable with a full pay load

4. No major clipping.

5. Must be crash resistant.

6.Must be medium in size not very small or big please

Extra points:

1. Ejection seat

2. Can glide with throttle at 0%

3. No clipping

4. VTOL or SVTOL

5.Internal missile and bomb bay

Please send me a download link or a tutorial on how to build it so i can test it and make the file mac compatible! This is in version 0.25. Also tell me if your participating in this challenge please.
